LanguageData.VSIE_GoingForAWalk.label: going for a walk
LanguageData.VSIE_GoingForAWalk.calledOffMessage: The date has been called off.
LanguageData.VSIE_GoingForAWalk.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} is going for a walk with {COMPANION_labelShort}.
LanguageData.VSIE_GrabbingBeer.label: grabbing beer
LanguageData.VSIE_GrabbingBeer.calledOffMessage: The beer party has been called off.
LanguageData.VSIE_BingeParty.label: binge party
LanguageData.VSIE_BingeParty.calledOffMessage: The feast has been called off.
LanguageData.VSIE_BingeParty.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} suggests doing a little binge party. Be warned - Binge parties can last up to a few hours. Colonists will binge on food and drugs until it is over. Simply draft your colonists to stop them taking part in the binge party.
LanguageData.VSIE_OutdoorParty.label: outdoor party
LanguageData.VSIE_OutdoorParty.calledOffMessage: The outdoor party has been called off.
LanguageData.VSIE_OutdoorParty.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} suggests having an outdoors party. Colonists will go outdoors and have a campfire, and then sit around it and talk.
LanguageData.VSIE_Funeral.label: funeral
LanguageData.VSIE_Funeral.calledOffMessage: The funeral has been called off.
LanguageData.VSIE_Funeral.letterText: Colonists gather over the {DEADPAWN_labelShort}'s grave to honor {DEADPAWN_possessive} memory.
LanguageData.VSIE_BirthdayParty.label: birthday
LanguageData.VSIE_BirthdayParty.calledOffMessage: The birthday party has been called off.
LanguageData.VSIE_BirthdayParty.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} is throwing a birthday party! Everyone who goes will gain recreation and social energy, and a lasting positive mood boost.
